text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's talk podcast
calm
this is a brand-new series of daily
video vocabulary visit daily to learn a
new word so you can be more fluent in
English daily video vocabulary episode 1
today's word is running late
well what do you mean by that so what
does running late mean does it mean that
you are just running somewhere No it
basically means arriving late at
something it can be at a meeting an
appointment or at work being late for
work is a common problem that we all
face but telling your boss why you are
late is difficult especially when you
have to do it in English
in this episode listen to examples how
to use the phrase running late in your
daily conversation now let's have a look
at some example sentences if you want to
tell your boss that you're reaching late
to work because of traffic you can say
the traffic is really bad so I'm running
late well you can also use it as an
excuse to reach late if you are late for
office meeting you can say I am running
a bit late so please start the meeting
without me
Mary is running late she will be here in
10 minutes
